column5: Went out for some pike action today with Slowpoke and had a great time.  Ended up with 3 landed 5 or 6 lost and at least 10 or more that came in close to take a swipe at things (that we saw)  25" Pike jjcanoe   23.5" Pike   Had a great time and we'll have to do it again Slowpoke!   jjcanoe
Them are some purty slime - nice report!
Got the first one on a Rapala type minnow and the next two on a Berkley Shakey Shad Plastic with a small jig head.  jjcanoe
Well you guys did ok for a days fishing thanks for the report and pics....cheers
You like my oven mitts?  jjcanoe
